business.profession: New Transtar is a professional outfit with experience in audiovisual translation, dubbing, subtitling, post production and broadcasting.
business.rigorous: New Transtar is offering a customized quality control system for every single step including translation, dubbing and post production. They meet our broadcast requirements. We trust them.
business.bundesligaDesc: New Transtar is our go-to company for language translations and sports commentaries. We find them professional and flexible with the approach they take with Bundesliga related programming.

table1.string1: Dubbing Script Translation Price (per 45 minutes of video)
table1.string3: Music & Effects Recreation: 650/45 video minutes, Post Production: 1000/45 video minutes, Subtitling: 400/45 video minutes
table1.string10: 1. Promo translation/dubbing/subtitling is billed by the minute. Prices quoted above are based on an episode of a TV Drama. The quoted film price is multiplied by the corresponding coefficient.
table1.string11: 2. Express delivery prices are 30% higher than the standard rates
table1.string12: 3. All prices above are for reference, please contact us for an exact quotation. TEL: (010)5301-3009,15810493647

table2.string6: English to Other Foreign Languages (CNY/1,000 words)
table2.string7: Other Foreign Languages to English (CNY/1,000 words)
table2.string12: Translation between Chinese and Foreign Languages
table2.string13: Chinese to Other Foreign Languages (CNY/1,000 characters)
table2.string15: Between Chinese and Foreign Languages (CNY/1,000 characters)

table3.string14: 1. Transcription and translation is billed by the minute, which includes the source language's dictation and script-translation. Urgent service prices are 30% higher than the standard
table3.string15: 2. The price for the translation of more than 30 minutes is negotiable
table3.string16: 3. All prices above are for reference. Please contact us for an exact quotation. TEL: (010)-5301-3009, 15810493647

table4.string1: Simultaneous Interpretation Price (two simultaneous interpreters are arranged and they are alternated every 20 minutes)
table4.string4: Interpretation among Chinese, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Korean, German, Italian, Russian
table4.string5: Interpretation among Chinese, African Indigenous Languages, Scandinavian Languages and other minor languages
table4.string8: 1. The minimum charge above is for 1 hour.
table4.string9: 2. Please make an appointment with us two weeks in advance for (simultaneous) interpretation services.
table4.string10: 3. We lease advanced interpretation equipment and provide support.
table4.string11: 4. The working hours for each of our simultaneous interpreters are 6 hours per day. Overtime work exceeding more than 1 hour will be charged at twice the unit price above. If you require a rehearsal one day in advance, the rehearsal fee will vary based on the level of the interpreters. The average charge is about 2,000 CNY half a day per person.
table4.string12: 5. The price of interpretation service with a business trip is 20% higher than the standard, and the customer is responsible for the cost of transportation, accommodation and the safety of our interpreters and is required to purchase personal accident insurance for them.
table4.string13: 6. All prices above are for reference. Please contact us for an exact quotation. TEL：(010)-5301-3009, 15810493647

table5.string12: Over 30 high-level attendees; Such as a summit, industry seminar, press conference, etc.
table5.string14: 1. The working hours of each of our interpreters are 8 hours per day
table5.string15: 2. Please make an appointment two weeks in advance for interpretation services.
table5.string16: 3. Overtime work exceeding one hour will accrue extra fees of around 400 to 600 CNY per person, per hour. In regard to interpretation service with business trips, the customer is responsible for the cost of transportation, accommodation and the safety of our interpreters, and is required to purchase personal accident insurance for them
table5.string17: 4. The service prices of special sectors and minor languages interpretation are negotiable
table5.string18: 5. The service prices are negotiable for customers who have established long-term cooperation with us
table5.string19: 6. All prices above are for reference. Please contact us for an exact quotation. TEL: (010)-5301-3009, 15810493647

business.title: Our Businesses
business.video: Video services provided include revision, translation, dubbing, mixing and subtitling for TV series, movies, documentaries, cartoons,  promos, etc.
business.thematic: Services include multi-language translation, expert and native language revision, typesetting, and quality control of broadcast media, sports entertainment, contracts, product descriptions, company profiles, etc.
business.interpretation: On-the-spot services provided include liaison, consecutive, simultaneous and telephone interpretation for various fields and levels. Our skilled and experienced interpreters are accredited by authoritative agencies both domestically and abroad.
business.dubbing: Audio and dubbing services provided include professional dubbing services, sound design, mixing, subtitling, video production, and quality control. With world-class hardware and software, we produce competitive media to meet global standards.

1001.title: WOMAN IN A FAMILY OF SWORDSMEN
1001.short: One of many StarTimes-translated-and dubbed hit TV dramas
1001.desc: On September 22nd, 2015, the opening ceremony of the 2015 Chinese Year - Beijing Week in South Africa and 2015 Beijing TV Dramas & Movies Broadcasting Season in Africa was successfully held in Johannesburg, South Africa. The deputy mayor of Beijing expressed his best wishes for the ceremony in his address. He regarded the broadcasting season as a new window for cultural exchange between China and South Africa, strengthening communication and cooperation between the two countries.
1001.language: English, French, Swahili, Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba, Luganda
1001.comment: It’s an important initiative for The Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio and Television to introduce Chinese TV dramas and movies to Africa and promote cultural exchange and cooperation between China and Africa. The Young Doctor, Ordinary World, The Mi Family’s Marriage, The Left Ear, A Wedding Invitation, etc., in total about 400 episodes of TV series and 17 movies, were translated and dubbed into seven languages including English, French, Swahili, Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba, Luganda. These programs were screened on StarTimes Sino Drama Channel (previously known as ST Chinese 2), and received great acclaim and ratings, with Woman in a Family of Swordsmen as the favorite.

1002.title: IF YOU ARE THE ONE
1002.short: Screened during the StarTimes-held Chinese Movie Caravan
1002.desc: In September, 2016, the launch ceremony for the Beijing TV Dramas & Movies Broadcasting Season in Africa was successfully held in Abuja, the capital of Nigeria. It’s an important initiative for The Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio and Television to introduce Chinese TV dramas and movies to Africa and promote cultural exchange and cooperation between China and Africa.
1002.language: English, French, Portuguese, Swahili, Hausa, Yoruba, Luganda
1002.comment: After being broadcasted on StarTimes’ self-owned channels, this film won great acclaim among African audiences, as well as a positive ratings. In 2017, during the StarTimes-held Chinese Movie Caravan, this movie was also screened.

1003.title: JOURNEY TO THE WEST
1003.short: This is one of StarTimes’ most elaborate translated and dubbed works.
1003.desc: This is one of StarTimes most elaborate translated and dubbed works. Featuring high production values, this version was purchased by CCTV. In 2017, the Swahili voice acting team from the StarTimes Translation and Dubbing Center performed a live dub at the Road and Belt Forum. Their vivid performance has won applause and recognition from audiences.
1003.comment: It earned amazing ratings after being broadcasted on StarTimes KungFu and Sino Drama Channels. At the request of audiences, it has been rebroadcasted many times and its ratings remain high.

1004.title: LET’S FALL IN LOVE
1004.short: A most well-received StarTimes-translated-and-dubbed TV drama
1004.desc: In July, 2017, the opening ceremony of the Beijing TV Dramas & Movies Broadcasting Season in Africa was successfully held in Zambia. It’s an important initiative for the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio and Television to introduce Chinese TV dramas and movies to Africa and promote cultural exchange and cooperation between China and Africa.
1004.language: English, French, Portuguese, Swahili, Hausa, Yoruba, Luganda
1004.comment: After it was broadcasted on StarTimes’ self-owned channels, the high quality of the translation and dub helped it win acclaim among African audiences and a rating of 2.6140%.

2001.title: Tender for Ghana's Terrestrial Digital Television Network Solution
2001.short: The project, including translation, native language revision, expert finalization and typesetting, was done within 4 days. StarTimes was praised for the positive attitude of its staff in their pursuit of perfection.
2001.desc: The project, including translation, native language revision, expert finalization and typesetting, was done within 4 days. StarTimes was praised for the positive attitude of its staff in their pursuit of perfection.

2002.title: Digital Migration in Guinea
2002.short: Delivered in 5 days. The client spoke highly of StarTimes for their rigorous and professional attitude during the process of translation.
2002.desc: Delivered in 5 days. The client spoke highly of StarTimes for their rigorous and professional attitude during the process of translation.

2003.title: Digital Migration in Cameroon
2003.short: Translation, proofreading by native editor, expert finalization and typesetting were completed in 3 days. This high-quality translation helped our client win the bid and earned high praise.
2003.desc: Translation, proofreading by native editor, expert finalization and typesetting were completed in 3 days. This high-quality translation helped our client win the bid and earned high praise.

2004.title: Bidding Documents for Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Services in Zambia
2004.short: Tender for the supply delivery, installation and commissioning of national digital terrestrial TV broadcasting system in Zambia. Translation, proofreading by native editor, expert finalization and typesetting were completed in 3.5 days. This high-quality translation helped our client win the bid and earned high praise.
2004.desc: Tender for the supply delivery, installation and commissioning of national digital terrestrial television broadcasting system in Zambia. Translation, proofreading by native editor, expert finalization and typesetting were completed in 3.5 days. This high-quality translation helped our client win the bid and earned high praise.

3001.title: The Journey of Flower
3001.short: A hit show on StarTimes Kung Fu Channel
3001.desc: Great translation, casting, dubbing and post-production have made it one of StarTimes' most outstanding dubbed TV dramas.
3001.comment: When it was broadcast on StarTimes’ self-owned KungFu Channel and Sino Drama Channel, this drama received a great response from audiences, as well as many comments on Facebook. It earned great ratings and acclaim from audiences. Subsequent rebroadcasts have also earned positive responses.

3002.title: A Bite of China
3002.short: A much-loved documentary about Chinese Food
3002.desc: This documentary series about Chinese food was translated and dubbed by StarTimes. The Chinese spirit and culture are reflected through the introduction of traditional Chinese foods.
3002.comment: The first and second seasons of this documentary were broadcast on StarTimes self-owned channels to high ratings, averaging 1.16%. Audiences in Nigeria developed great interest in Chinese food.

3003.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
3003.short: This film tells the story about a group of revolutionaries from all walks of life, including businessmen, beggars, coachmen, students and gamblers, protecting Sun Yat-sen, whom was under high pressure of both the Qing and British governments in the early 20th century. This film was released on December 18, 2009.
3003.desc: In September, 2016, the opening ceremony of the Beijing TV Dramas & Movies Broadcasting Season in Africa was successfully held in Abuja, the capital of Nigeria. It’s an important initiative for the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio and Television to introduce Chinese TV dramas and movies, to Africa and promote cultural exchange and cooperation between China and Africa.
3003.language: English, French, Portuguese, Swahili, Hausa, Yoruba, Luganda
3003.comment: This film gained popularity after being broadcast on StarTimes’ self-owned channels. It was also included in the Carnival of Films and TV Dramas held by StarTimes in 2017.

3004.title: Poppy Cat
3004.short: A classic English cartoon dubbed into Swahili and Hausa
3004.desc: Poppy Cat is an English preschool cartoon, which premiered on May 2, 2011. Its distinctive dubbing makes for a unique experience. StarTimes has produced excellent Swahili and Hausa dubs of Poppy Cat’s exciting adventures with her friends.
3004.comment: Since its release in 2013, this cartoon has seen a steady rise in prime-time viewership ratings by children on the Swahili and Hausa channels. Its Hausa language songs have found acclaim among Nigerian children.

4001.title: The 7th African Digital TV Development Seminar in 2017
4001.desc: The 7th African Digital TV Development Seminar was sponsored by StarTimes Group. Radio and television department heads from 46 countries in Africa and Asia, and representatives from the media world, came together to discuss continued cooperation and the digital development of radio, film and television.
4001.language: Simultaneous Interpretation in Chinese, English and French
4001.comment: Our interpreters were highly praised by the ministers and other representatives from African countries for their excellent language capabilities and professional bases of knowledge.

4002.title: Interpreting for RTV Cooperation in Rwanda
4002.desc: Representatives from the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television went to the national TV station of Rwanda to examine the feasibility of future cooperation.
4002.language: Consecutive Interpreting in Chinese, English, Swahili and French
4002.comment: In Rwanda, many residents speak Swahili and English, but many in the older generations speak French. StarTimes’ multilingual real-time interpreters, with their familiarity of African accents, ensured a smooth communication process.

4003.title: Interpreting for Communication and Cooperation with Nigerian Television Authority
4003.desc: Representatives from the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television went to the Nigerian Television Authority to examine the feasibility of future cooperation.
4003.language: Consecutive Interpreting in Chinese, Hausa, English and Yoruba
4003.comment: Hausa and Yoruba are main languages spoken in Nigeria. English is their official language, albeit it is spoken with strong accents. StarTimes’ interpreters were able to ensure a smooth and successful process of communication.

4004.title: Interpreting for Communication and Cooperation with Tanzania Broadcasting Corporation
4004.desc: Representatives from the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television went to Tanzania Broadcasting Corporation for discuss future cooperation
4004.language: Liaison Interpreting in Chinese, Swahili and English
4004.comment: Tanzanians mainly speak Swahili and have a strong sense of national pride, advocating for the use of standard Swahili. Many do not speak English. Fortunately, StarTimes’ interpreters helped break down the language barrier and ensure a successful visit.

aboutUs.profile1: New Transtar is an on-line translation platform developed by Beijing StarTimes Media Co., Ltd., composed of a group of experienced translators and experts committed to providing accurate multilingual translation, especially in the audio-visual field.
aboutUs.profile2: Apart from translation services, multilingual dubbing services are also provided through this platform. New Transtar has 32 dubbing studios, one Foley studio and one 5.1-channel surround sound mixing studio. We also work with many top foreign language universities in China to provide qualified translators.
aboutUs.profile3: We can offer quality comprehensive services, including subtitle creation and translation, dubbing, broadcasting, etc.
aboutUs.profile4: Bridge the gap between different languages
aboutUs.profile5: Professional staff hailing from over 30 countries

post1.title: English Translators
post1.responsibility1: 1. Help complete the dubbing of films and TV series, including but not limited to format adjustment, translation, linguistic quality control, editing subtitles and captions
post1.responsibility2: 2. Provide translation and editing services for other departments within StarTimes
post1.responsibility3: 3. Provide translation, interpretation, editing, and other language services for clients on New Transtar
post1.qualifications1: Education: Master's degree and above, good marks on IELTS or TOEFL exams, or oversea study experience preferred;
post1.qualifications2: Major: English or relative majors preferred, CAT;
post1.experience1: Experience in translating subtitles, dubbing scripts or literary works, using Trados, memoQ or other CAT tools, MS and TMS, organization of, or participation in, large multi-person cooperative translation projects, experience with CAT, or terminology management, and translation memory applications preferred; experience studying or working overseas preferred;
post1.request1: 1. Good at translating from Chinese to English and vice versa
post1.request2: 2. Enjoying translating and having interest in translating techniques
post1.request4: 4. Ability to adapt, learn, execute, communicate and work under pressure
post1.request5: 5. Having a positive attitude, good team spirit, and a sense of responsibility
post1.benefits1: 1. Opportunities to take part in dubbing
post1.benefits2: 2. Competitive salary and attractive benefits, great opportunities for career development
post1.benefits3: 3. Modern working environment, lively atmosphere and company culture

post2.title: English Native Editors
post2.responsibility1: 1. Editing and polishing all varieties of English translations, including scripts for dubbing, promos, and other files
post2.responsibility2: 2. Be aware of the needs of this industry, provide useful feedbacks for translators and the project managers, help the team improve their professional skills
post2.responsibility3: 3. Provide necessary dubbing services when needed
post2.qualifications1: Educational Background: Bachelor's degree or above;
post2.qualifications2: Major: Open to all majors, News, media, films and television translation, CAT preferred;
post2.experience1: Experience in audiovisual translation or literary works preferred; Experience in using Trados, memoQ or other CAT tools, and in organizing, or participating in, large multi-person cooperative translation projects is preferred;
post2.request1: 1. An understanding of, and a love for, Chinese culture, excellent Chinese language skills (HSK4 or above)
post2.request2: 2. Capable of translation from Chinese to English if needed
post2.request3: 3. Able to finish assigned tasks on time, with good quality
post2.request4: 4. Enjoys working in media translation, is a responsible team player with a positive attitude; is able to work under pressure and multi-task
post2.benefits1: 1. Competitive salary and attractive benefits, great opportunities for career development
post2.benefits2: 2. Modern Working environment, lively atmosphere and company culture

post3.title: French Translators
post3.responsibility1: 1. Translating dubbing scripts from Chinese or English to French, formatting scripts, linguistic quality control, editing subtitles and captions for the various channels operated by StarTimes in Africa and the other domestic film and TV series translation projects
post3.responsibility3: 3. Providing translation, interpretation, editing and other language services for clients on New Transtar
post3.qualifications1: Educational Background: Bachelor's degree or above;
post3.experience1: Experience in audiovisual translation or literary works preferred;
post3.experience2: Experience in using Trados, memoQ or other CAT tools, MS and TMS, organization of, or participation in, large multi-person cooperative translation projects, experience with CAT, or terminology management, and translation memory applications preferred;
post3.experience3: Experience studying or working abroad is preferred;
post3.request1: 1. Excellent French language skills, good at writing, listening, speaking, and translating
post3.request2: 2. English language skills equal to that of CET6 or higher, excellent reading and comprehension abilities
post3.request3: 3. A passion for translation and an interest in different translation techniques, fluent in Chinese and French, well-versed in different styles of writing
post3.request4: 4. Standard diction, a clear and expressive voice, able to take part in internal dubbing work
post3.request5: 5. An appreciation of film, TV and literature
post3.request6: 6. The ability to adapt, learn, execute, communicate and work under pressure, a positive attitude, an ability to work as part of a team, and a sense of responsibility

1.title: Get to know New Transtar at the CIFTVP Exhibition
1.author: New Transtar
content: The 15th CIFTVP Exhibition (China International Film & TV Programs Exhibition) will be held at the Beijing Exhibition Center on May 17th to the 19th, 2018. Invited attendees include famous TV stations, distributors, and producers from China and overseas and will showcase an array of critically acclaimed TV series, films, documentaries, cartoons and other genres of contents from China and overseas, providing a media feast for its participants.
img:/news/201853092447.webp

New Transtar will present itself at the Exhibition on behalf of StarTimes, and we will give a comprehensive introduction of ourselves, including the current services we offer, the advantages we hold, and the projects we have completed, to help you understand us more. New Transtar boasts of an international team of professionals and is capable of providing fast and quality-guaranteed services including translating, dubbing, subtitle making, post-production, broadcasting and collecting of viewership ratings, thanks to our strict, streamlined and developed quality control and project management system

New Transtar will also offer you one of our specially-prepared gifts, and you may even be invited to try some of the high-class, authentic red wine produced at our StarTimes-owned wineries in South Africa!
img:/news/201853092528.webp
You can find us at booth 3B-10 in building No. 3, Beijing Exhibition Center. We’ll be looking forward to seeing you!

2.title: New Transtar is making its voice heard at 2018 Translating Films, Bridging Cultures conference
2.author: New Transtar
content: img:/news/201853093518.webp:Picture taken at the opening ceremony of 2018 Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation and Dubbing Cooperation Symposium :（Source: vos.com.cn）

During the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, the opening ceremony of 2018 Translating Films, Bridging Cultures conference and the 2018 Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation and Dubbing Cooperation Symposium, jointly hosted by the Bureau for External Cultural Relations of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism and International Cooperation Department of the State Administration of Radio and Television, which was presented by Communication University of China and Chinese Cultural Translation and Studies Support Network, sponsored by committee of the Beijing International Film Festival, and was held at Communication University of China on April 17th, 2018. 40 foreign guests, including film festival chairpersons, directors of film and television organizations, translation experts from 24 countries including the US, Canada, Australia, Italy, Austria, Russian, France, UK, Uruguay, Tanzania, Egypt, Sri Lanka and Sebegal, scholars and experts from more than 30 Chinese universities and more than 50 Chinese film and television organizations were invited.

Zhu Qi, deputy director of the Bureau for External Cultural Relations at the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, said at the opening ceremony that 2018 marked the 40 anniversary of China’s Reform and Opening Up and that China’s cultural and art industries were ready to communicate more with the outside world, building on the achievements they’ve made so far. He also said that the workshop had built a high-level, sustainable and reliable exchange platform to allow for all to promote high-level translation and dubbing cooperation on high-quality film and television projects, thus achieving an in-depth cultural exchange.
img:/news/201853093530.webp:Zhu Qi, deputy director of Bureau for External Cultural Relations at the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, delivering a speech:（Source: vos.com.cn）

Director of the International Cooperation Department at the State Administration of Radio and Television Ma Li said in his speech that China’s been developing rapidly, and that the domestic cultural industry and the TV and film industry have both benefited from it. China produces the largest number of TV shows and films, has the most active and lively TV and film industry and the largest number of viewers. This thriving market calls for more projects to be done, and many Chinese TV shows and films have received favorable reviews at international film festivals held overseas. These TV shows and films hail universal values and are critically acclaimed by both domestic and overseas viewers for the wisdom, emotion, innovation and modern thinking exhibited in them

As one of the presenters, StarTimes, developer of New Transtar, attended the opening ceremony, as well as the Audiovisual Translation and Dissemination in the Light of The Belt and Road Initiative forum, the Translation and Dubbing of Military-Themed Movies and TV Shows forum, etc., and engaged in an in-depth discussion in regard to how to promote and popularize dubbed Chinese TV shows and films overseas, how to choose content-competitive TV shows and films, and how to better tailor translation and dubbing work according to their target languages and cultures.
img:/news/201853093547.webp:Lily Meng, deputy general manager of the Media Division of StarTimes delivering her speech

Lily Meng, deputy general manager of the Media Division of StarTimes, said in her speech titled StarTimes - Ambassador of Chinese TV Shows and Films that StarTimes has been dedicating itself to the digital migration of Africa, and that translated and dubbed Chinese TV shows and films have played an important role in promoting Sino-African cultural exchange and communication. She also said that as a professional translation and dubbing powerhouse in China, StarTimes is planning to translate, dub, and post-produce the best TV shows and films in and outside of China on its New Transtar platform and release them into the global market, becoming a true ambassador of Chinese TV shows and films

After her speech, Ms. Meng had an in-depth discussion with attendees from Egypt, Pakistan, Nepal, Tanzania, UK, and Senegal in regard to the production, purchasing, translation, dubbing, marketing, and distributing of TV shows and films, and all parties expressed interest in future cooperation.
New Transtar, a rising star in language service industry!

3.title: The Second Session of the 2018 Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation & Dubbing Cooperation Workshop Opens in Shanghai New Transtar demonstrates how they bring Chinese films and TV dramas abroad
3.author: New Transtar
content: img:/news/201806210928.webp:The opening ceremony of the Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation and Dubbing Cooperation Workshop in Shanghai

On June, 13th, the 2018 Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation and Dubbing Cooperation Workshop, jointly hosted by the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, and the International Cooperation Office of the State Administration of Radio and Television, organized by the Shanghai Municipal Administration of Culture, Radio, Film and TV was held in Shanghai. About 40 translation scholars and experts, and representatives from international film and TV institutions from 31 countries attended the workshop, including Nepal, Indonesia, Malaysia, Morocco, Cuba, Uruguay, the US, Spain, Greece, the UK, Russia, France, Bulgaria, Nigeria, Ireland, Argentina, and Dubai.

The workshop was held for the first time in 2015, and is aimed at facilitating exchange and cooperation between Chinese and international audiovisual industries. As of now, about 240 experts from over 60 countries and regions have been invited to take part in it. Many excellent Chinese films and TV dramas have entered the global market through the activities held at, and after, the workshop, such as road shows, forums, visits, cooperation, and translation studies. (Source: eastday.com)
img:/news/201806210932.webp: Zhu Qi, deputy director of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, giving a speech

“Sino-foreign audiovisual translation and dubbing cooperation and exchange is an important method of promoting people-to-people exchange under the Belt and Road initiative. It opens a window for people all over the world to know more about China’s culture, future outlook, and development.” In the opening ceremony, Zhu Qi, deputy director of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism pointed out that the workshop would focus on promoting excellent Chinese films and TV dramas that can represent a real China in an all-encompassing way and with common values, to translation experts coming from other countries, in order to facilitate cooperation in translation and dubbing between Chinese and foreign companies. (Source: eastday.com)
img:/news/201806210935.webp:Participants at the 2018 Sino-Foreign Audiovisual Translation and Dubbing Cooperation Workshop

During the workshop, apart from exchanging thoughts with their Chinese counterparts, delegates from international film and TV organizations and audiovisual translation and dubbing experts also visited the TV Market of Shanghai TV Festival, and the Film Market of Shanghai International Film Festival. They selected well-made film and TV programs, and explored opportunities for the exchange of film and TV programs and cooperation with dozens of Chinese film and TV organizations.

New Transtar, a translation and dubbing service platform developed by StarTimes, made a speech on June 16th. In her speech titled ‘New Transtar: Chinese Movies and TV Series’ Grand World Tour’, Ms. Xin Aihua, manager of the Translation Department, introduced New Transtar’s professional abilities in translation, dubbing, subtitling, post-production, broadcasting, TV survey, distribution, and more. She explained how New Transtar brought Chinese TV programs and films overseas by showing some of the best dubbed shows, such as Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms, Wolf Warriors, Boonie Bears, and A Bite of China.

New Transtar, an on-line translation platform, has now officially launched. Go to www.newtranstar.com and register, and you’ll be able to place an order. We strive to provide our customers with strategic solutions that exceed expectations, improve both quality and scale of content localization, and turn high-quality translated and dubbed programs into content assets. We are committed to cultivating talent in translation, dubbing and proofreading, and are seeking to cooperate with content providers, all varieties of broadcast platforms, distributors, TV survey providers, language experts from universities, and translation and proofreading experts.

After her speech, Ms. Xin exchanged thoughts on translation and dubbing cooperation, getting Chinese film and TV programs out in the world, copyright and distribution, and documentary production and distribution with attendees from TV and film organizations from within and outside of China, translation and dubbing institutions, distribution organizations, representatives from international translation and dubbing associations, sinologists, experts and professors from universities. All parties expressed interest in future cooperation.
New Transtar, a rising star in the language service industry!
